source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 767,055 damage to your primary target and 149,239 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 663,580 damage to your primary target and 133,201 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 692,805 damage to your primary target and 160,018 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 673,115 damage to your primary target and 139,879 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 1 million Fire damage split between nearby enemies.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 869 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 869 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
